description: KARACHI – Widespread rains with isolated heavy falls are likely in Karachi, Hyderabad and parts of Sindh on Sunday night, Monday and Tuesday with occasional gaps. Per the Pakistan Meteorological Department (PMD), a well-marked low pressure lies over northwest Madhya Pradesh and surroundings, and moving westwards. Due to this low-pressure system, strong monsoon currents are […]
title: Karachi, Hyderabad, Sindh weather update; widespread rains likely

description: ISLAMABAD – Significant monsoon rains with isolated heavy falls are predicted in Islamabad, Rawalpindi and parts of Pakistan on Sunday night, Monday and Tuesday with occasional gaps. Per the Pakistan Meteorological Department (PMD), a well-marked low pressure lies over northwest Madhya Pradesh and surroundings, and moving westwards. Due to this low-pressure system, strong monsoon currents […]
title: Islamabad, Pakistan weather update; significant monsoon rains predicted

description: LAHORE – Two leading Chinese companies have announced to set up their plants in Pakistan with one setting up a sole entity while the other in a joint venture with a local company to manufacture raw materials for the textile industry. Both companies were expected to invest millions of dollars in both the projects with […]
title: Chinese companies to set up textile-related raw material manufacturing plants in Punjab

description: RAWALPINDI – Bangladesh recorded their first-ever victory over Pakistan in 14 attempts, 20th overall in 143 Tests when they won the first Test at the Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium by 10 wickets with a session to spare here on Sunday. Pakistan, trailing by 117 runs on the first innings and starting the final day’s proceeding requiring […]
title: Bangladesh secure maiden Test victory over Pakistan

description: LAHORE – The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has responded to the Auditor General of Pakistan’s observations made during the annual audit regarding the allowances paid to former Management Committee Chair Mr Najam Sethi and three committee members – Mr Aizad Sayed, Mr Haroon Rashid and Mr Shakil Sheikh. “We acknowledge the auditors’ observations concerning the […]
title: PCB responds to audit observations regarding payments to Najam Sethi, other members

description: The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has confirmed the 14-member Pakistan Shaheens squad for the three 50-over matches series against Bangladesh ‘A’ at the Islamabad Club, starting on 26 August. The second and third 50-over matches will take place on 28 and 30 August, respectively. Wicketkeeper-batter Mohammad Haris will lead the side as the selectors have […]
title: Mohammad Haris to lead Pakistan Shaheens against Bangladesh ‘A’ in One-Day series

description: LAHORE – Fatima Sana has been named Pakistan Women’s captain for the ICC Women’s T20 World Cup 2024 in the United Arab Emirates from 3 to 20 October. 22-year-old Fatima, who has featured in 41 ODIs and 40 T20Is, has previously led Pakistan’s emerging and domestic sides. She also captained the Pakistan side to a […]
title: Fatima Sana named Pakistan captain for ICC Women’s T20 World Cup

description: Power Minister Awais Leghari on Saturday said the federal government has begun reviewing terms of Chinese independent power producers (IPPs) regarding debt reprofiling and the sourcing of coal. Last month, Islamabad requested Beijing to convert imported coal-based projects to local coal and re-profile more than $15 billion in energy sector liabilities to create fiscal […]
title: Govt reviewing IPPs’ coal sourcing, debt reprofiling with China: Awais

description: KARACHI- On Sunday, August 25, 2024, the exchange rate for one US Dollar against Pakistani rupees was recorded at Rs 279.1 in the local and open market, with a selling rate of Rs 280. Note: Exchange rates can vary based on the location and the Exchange Company or bank involved in the transaction. Below are […]
title: Currency exchange rates in Pakistan today – August 25, 2024

description: KARACHI—On Sunday, August 25, 2024, the price of 24-karat gold was PKR 264,500. Similarly, the bullion market recorded the price of 24-karat gold at Rs 224,800 per 10g. description: Abdul Hadi Mayar Islamabad The United States has reiterated its support to Pakistan’s efforts against terrorism and said that both Islamabad and Washington ‘have a shared interest in holding the (Afghan) Taliban to their counterterrorism commitments.’ In an inclusive interaction with Pakistan Observer, a spokesperson of the US embassy in Islamabad said, “our most enduring […]
title: US reiterates support to Pakistan’s efforts against terrorism

description: Two children and a woman were killed while 14 others sustained injuries after a blast took place near police line in Pishin, Balochistan, police said on Saturday. According to the law enforcers, the injured were shifted to the hospital with some of them in critical condition. Seven policemen were among those injured when the remote-controlled […]
title: Children among 3 dead in Pishin blast
